text: taurat badhyata (bharam) mopabadina taruvata danipai amalu ceyaleka poyina vari polika, pustakala bharanni mose a gadida vale undi. (Varu a bharanni bharincare gani, danini artham cesukoleka poyaru). Allah sucana (ayat) lanu tiraskarincina vari drstantamu enta ceddadi. Mariyu allah durmargulaku margadarsakatvam ceyadu
